text: Andrés Flores Jaco (born January 20, 1995) is a Salvadoran professional footballer, who plays as a defender for El Salvador. ==Alianza F.C.== His contract was renewed for two more years in 2016 and is sufficient until 2018. Starting for Alianza in a fixture against Atlético Marte, Flores was injured after a sliding tackle. He underwent tests in order to verify the severity of the injury which was inflicted on his left leg. ==Personal life== Flores Jaco attends the Universidad Salvadoreña Alberto Masferrer. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Salvadoran footballers Category:El Salvador international footballers Category:Alianza F.C. title: Andrés Flores Jaco
